reviews.text: Almost no head, little carbonation, but very pleasant taste and smell. This is a pretty amazing beer, very well done. The only downside is that itâs very hard to find.
Great beer !!! Excellent body, nice taste, caramel colour, soft alcohol percentage and best NOT hangover result !!!
Very good beer for almost any occasion. Pleasant smell. Good taste without being super delicious. Small head. Overall a safe choice.
